1: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>slept</n> יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <sup>3092 </sup> <n>Now Jehoshaphat</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲבֹתָ֔יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>with his fathers</n> וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <sup>6912 </sup> <n>and was buried</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲבֹתָ֖יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>with his fathers</n> בְּעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the city</n> דָּוִ֑יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reigned</n> יְהוֹרָ֥ם <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And Jehoram</n> בְּנ֖וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his son</n> תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>his place</n>
2: וְלֽוֹ־ אַחִ֞ים <sup>251 </sup> <n>And he had brethren</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>of Jehoshaphat</n> עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <sup>5838 </sup> <n>Azariah</n> וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <sup>3171 </sup> <n>and Jehiel</n> וּזְכַרְיָ֣הוּ <sup>2148 </sup> <n>and Zechariah</n> וַעֲזַרְיָ֔הוּ <sup>5838 </sup> <n>and Azariah</n> וּמִיכָאֵ֖ל <sup>4317 </sup> <n>and Michael</n> וּשְׁפַטְיָ֑הוּ <sup>8203 </sup> <n>and Shephatiah</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> אֵ֕לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>all these [were] the sons</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>of Jehoshaphat</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
3: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> לָהֶ֣ם ׀ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֲ֠בִיהֶם <sup>1 </sup> <n>And their father</n> מַתָּנ֨וֹת <sup>4979 </sup> <n>gifts</n> רַבּ֜וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>them great</n> לְכֶ֤סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> וּלְזָהָב֙ <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and of gold</n> וּלְמִגְדָּנ֔וֹת <sup>4030 </sup> <n>and of precious things</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> מְצֻר֖וֹת <sup>4694 </sup> <n>with fenced</n> בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>in Judah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <sup>4467 </sup> <n>but the kingdom</n> נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> לִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <sup>3088 </sup> <n>he to Jehoram</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>because he [was] the firstborn</n> פ

18: וְאַחֲרֵ֖י <sup>310 </sup> <n>And after</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> נְגָפ֨וֹ <sup>5062 </sup> <n>smote</n> יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>all this the LORD</n> בְּמֵעָ֛יו <sup>4578 </sup> <n>him in his bowels</n> לָחֳלִ֖י <sup>2483 </sup> <n>disease</n> לְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <sup>4832 </sup> <n>cure</n>
19: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> לְיָמִ֣ים ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it came to pass that in process of time</n> מִיָּמִ֡ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>years</n> וּכְעֵת֩ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>after</n> צֵ֨את <sup>3318 </sup> <n>fell out</n> הַקֵּ֜ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>the end</n> לְיָמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>years</n> שְׁנַ֗יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>of two</n> יָצְא֤וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came</n> מֵעָיו֙ <sup>4578 </sup> <n>his bowels</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>by reason</n> חָלְי֔וֹ <sup>2483 </sup> <n>of his sickness</n> וַיָּ֖מָת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>so he died</n> בְּתַחֲלֻאִ֣ים <sup>8463 </sup> <n>diseases</n> רָעִ֑ים <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of sore</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> עָ֨שׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made</n> ל֥וֹ עַמּ֛וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And his people</n> שְׂרֵפָ֖ה <sup>8316 </sup> <n>no burning</n> כִּשְׂרֵפַ֥ת <sup>8316 </sup> <n>for him like the burning</n> אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n>
20: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>years old</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>Thirty</n> וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and two</n> הָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>was he when he began to reign</n> וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <sup>8083 </sup> <n>eight</n> שָׁנִ֔ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מָלַ֖ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>and he reigned</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>departed</n> בְּלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> חֶמְדָּ֔ה <sup>2532 </sup> <n>without being desired</n> וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>Howbeit they buried</n> בְּעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>him in the city</n> דָּוִ֔יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וְלֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> בְּקִבְר֥וֹת <sup>6913 </sup> <n>but not in the sepulchres</n> הַמְּלָכִֽים׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the kings</n>
